body:
You need to print the whole application form on A4 paper, with one printed side per page. You don’t need to sign any of the printed documents.

The application pack includes:

- 3 copies of the C100 application form - the court will send 1 copy to the other person, keep 1 copy, and return 1 copy to you
- instructions for posting and payment (you can ignore the payment instructions if you have a ‘Help with fees’ reference)

If you can’t open the PDF, try using Adobe Acrobat Reader. You can [download Adobe Reader]({app:urls:url:adobe-reader}) for free.
heading: 1. Print your application
